forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 2pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 2pm and 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 81, with temperatures falling to around 78 in the afternoon. South wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
